CheckTitle: Ensure RAM password policy prevents password reuse
Description: Ensures that the RAM password policy prevents password reuse. Preventing password reuse helps ensure that old passwords, which may have been compromised, cannot be reused.
Risk: Allowing password reuse may allow attackers to use previously compromised credentials to gain access to accounts.

Recommendation.Text: Update the RAM password policy to prevent password reuse. Go to RAM Console > Settings > Security Settings and enable password reuse prevention (recommend preventing reuse of at least the last 5 passwords).
